ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Krampus that stole Yule! Who has been naughty and who has been nice? This year the Krampus has deemed Tarot and Raven Hex to be very naughty! The Yule Devils make a surprise visit to Witch Manor and this time they are bringing a She-Krampus for the Skeleton Man! Merry Hex-mas to all!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jim Balent | 1 | B | 1:10 Cover B | Jim Balent | 2 | Var | Deluxe Studio Cover | Jim Balent | 3 | Var | Holiday Yule Edition Cover | Jim Balent | Missing |
